data.title: Sugar Episode 7: How to watch in the US and UK? Episode schedule
data.meta_description: "Sugar” is headlined by Oscar nominee Colin Farrell in the role of John Sugar, a private investigator unraveling the mystery behind the disappearance of a Hollywood executive's granddaughter, the show has kept viewers on the edge of their seats.
data.text:
Synopsis

"Sugar” is headlined by Oscar nominee Colin Farrell in the role of John Sugar, a private investigator unraveling the mystery behind the disappearance of a Hollywood executive's granddaughter, the show has kept viewers on the edge of their seats.

The latest buzz in the world of television revolves around the mind-bending twists of the Apple TV+ series, Sugar. With Oscar nominee Colin Farrell leading the cast as John Sugar, a private investigator delving into the disappearance of a Hollywood executive's granddaughter, the show has kept audiences on the edge of their seats.

Sugar Episode 6 Revelation

As per a report by Radio Times, Episode 6 of Sugar drops a bombshell that promises to reshape the plot. Available for streaming on Apple TV+, this episode marks a turning point in the series, challenging viewers to reassess everything they thought they knew about the storyline so far. Alongside Farrell, the stellar cast includes Amy Ryan, James Cromwell, and Anna Gunn, adding depth and intrigue to the unfolding mystery.

Sugar Episode 7 Release Date: Mark Your Calendars

As fans eagerly await the next chapter, the burning question remains: When will Episode 7 hit the screens? Set your reminders for Friday, 10th May 2024, when "The Friends You Keep" is scheduled to premiere on Apple TV+. This installment promises to unravel further layers of suspense and intrigue, keeping audiences hooked on the captivating tale of John Sugar's investigation.

Sugar Release Schedule: A Recap

For those keeping track, here's a rundown of the Sugar release schedule thus far, along with upcoming episode titles and release dates:

Episode 1: "Olivia" – Released on Friday, 5th April 2024

Episode 2: "These People, These Place" – Released on Friday, 5th April 2024

Episode 3: "Shibuya Crossing" – Released on Friday, 12th April 2024

Episode 4: "Starry Eyed" – Released on Friday, 19th April 2024

Episode 5: "Boy in the Corner" – Released on Friday, 26th April 2024

Episode 6: "Go Home" – Released on Friday, 3rd May 2024

Episode 7: "The Friends You Keep" – Scheduled for Friday, 10th May 2024

Episode 8: "Farewell" – Scheduled for Friday, 17th May 2024

All about Sugar

Sugar offers a contemporary twist on the classic private detective story, with Colin Farrell portraying the enigmatic John Sugar. Tasked with uncovering the truth behind Olivia Siegel's disappearance, Sugar finds himself entangled in a web of family secrets and Hollywood intrigue.

As the investigation deepens, the series explores themes of mystery, suspense, and the complexities of human relationships, captivating audiences with each episode.

Don't Miss Out: Viewing Times

For viewers worldwide, new episodes of Sugar drop at the following times:

5 am BST (British Summer Time)

12 am ET (Eastern Time)

9 pm PT (Pacific Time)

11 pm CT (Central Time)

FAQs:

How many episodes are there of Sugar?

"Sugar" is an eight-part American mystery drama television series crafted by Mark Protosevich. Fernando Meirelles helmed five episodes, while Adam Arkin directed the remaining three.

What is the twist in the Sugar TV show?

In the sixth episode of the series, John Sugar, portrayed by Farrell, unveils a surprising twist: he's depicted as a bluish-purple humanoid alien. Sugar assumes the guise of a vintage Hollywood-enthusiast private investigator on a quest to locate the vanished granddaughter of a renowned film director, played by James Cromwell.
